Reviews.Title: It's not new
Reviews.Author: Wilson Vallecilla
Reviews.Content: I bought this product such as new but it isn't. Also I have been trouble because it resets several times. I'm outside from USA and it took several days to arrived until my hands. The seller only gave 30 days guarantee. I lost my money

Reviews.Title: Blackberry remanufactured, NOT new.
Reviews.Author: Rafael Ramirez "RR"
Reviews.Content: The title of the product is described as new, but in the back where the battery has a label that REMANUFACTURED IN CHINA.This seller is a cheat and a liar.Thank God the blackberry has worked well.

Reviews.Title: Pendiente con este articulo!
Reviews.Author: BARBARA
Reviews.Content: Estos articulos se ven de buena presencia, pero uno de ellos vino bloqueado y sin poder lograr su funcionamiento. El otro pudo funcionar sin mayor novedad. Pero en gnal recomiendo revisar bien esta opcion.

Reviews.Title: Not satisfied!
Reviews.Author: danitacastro
Reviews.Content: This cell phone came in late. And on top  of that it didn't work all that well. I live in Venezuela, and when I arrived here had to pay to get it fixed.

Reviews.Title: voice calls not heard
Reviews.Author: DruEl "DruEl"
Reviews.Content: I got this phone because of its slim features and the prospect of its the wi-fi capabilities and has ended up regretting it because I am not being able to talk to anyone and get them to hear me unless I use the speakerphone.I donot want to use speakerphone on all of my calls..so this is ridiculous.Dont buy it..go for something better!

Reviews.Title: Bueno
Reviews.Author: Daniel Garcia
Reviews.Content: Excelente producto, cumple totalmente con el requerimiento, escelente entrega, buen negocio, muy agradecido.  Llego en buen estado y perfectas condiciones

Reviews.Title: Don't recommend this model
Reviews.Author: alexpr
Reviews.Content: The battery life sucks! One alarm only, you cannot set multiple alarms. You cannot upload ringtones without using special software. The cell phone is not being recognized by OS. The lock/unlock mechanism is just stupid. You cannot lock the phone with combination of key, you have to actually click the lock icon. Cannot turn down the ring volume, you have to do it thru switching between different preset modes. It doesn't connect to my WiFi. Everything I don't like about a cell phone is there.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: rosy
Reviews.Content: excellent phone. blackberry is the best mark on the market for smart phones. recommended for those who like to walk always communicated with the world

Reviews.Title: No good, I cheated!
Reviews.Author: Antonio Ortiz
Reviews.Content: Buy this phone for a gift and let me wrong, the phone does not work with all telephone lines, and when he grabbed a line of many that try, not connected to the internet, I do with a phone where the main function is the Internet and does not work. Buy this phone on the option again and sent me a rebuilt is amazing how you have cheated me, they should remove them from amazon and not let them sell anymore! I need my money back I will return your phone away!

Reviews.Title: why did you choose this rating
Reviews.Author: francisco daboin
Reviews.Content: why did you choose this ratingpor que es buy buena y llego todo bien muy contento con la compra

Reviews.Title: new blackberry Pearl 8120 unlocked black emerald wifi gsm phone
Reviews.Author: Jhonnatan Meza
Reviews.Content: New Blackberry Pearl 8120 Unlocked Black Emerald, me gusto la forma en que me llego el producto, cumplen con los tiempos establecidos

Reviews.Title: Good product!
Reviews.Author: Sanjay D. Sengupta "electronig gadget freak"
Reviews.Content: The product is good & received it a little late. There wasn't a tracking number specified on this site, though I recieved an email from the seller & Amazon. So, I had to open this email & click on the tracking number instead of logging into my Amazon account to get an update. Anyway, the product was received in good condition & I would recommend buying it.

Reviews.Title: Blackberry
Reviews.Author: Luiz A. De Marques
Reviews.Content: Like the tradition of the blackberrys products, the 8120 is a good option in size, ellegance and results..

ProductInfo.Name: Blackberry Pearl 8120 Unlocked Black Emerald WIFI GSM Phone
